metadata.metaDescription: Durham is a vibrant North Carolina city with diverse culture, rich history, and a flourishing community. It’s also known as the “City of Medicine,” with healthcare being a major industry including more than 300 medical and health-related companies and medical practices. It is a wonderful place to live for families, couples, and individuals. If you’re someone who is considering immigrating to the United States to become a legal resident of Durham, or somewhere else, or if you have been injured in an accident that wasn’t your fault, or if you have been accused with a crime, Vasquez Law Firm can help you. We are your top choice for representation! We are dedicated to helping clients reach their ideal resolution, no matter what situation they are in. We have extensive experience in personal injury, worker’s compensation, criminal defense, and family law. You can trust us to stand up for your rights! Call now to schedule a free consultation and allow us to apply our 35+ years of experience to your unique situation.

content.heroSection:
Charlotte, NC Workers’ Comp Lawyers

Risk of injury is everywhere. However, since most people spend a disproportionate amount of time at work, your risk of suffering a workplace injury is increased, depending on what you do! Some work sites have dangerous working conditions that aggravate the probability that you will suffer an injury, perhaps even one whose effects will follow you for the rest of your life. Most frustratingly, even though you are entitled to compensation in these instances, employers and insurance companies can make it difficult to access the financial support you need.

If you are stuck in this frustrating situation, you can use the help of the Charlotte workers’ comp lawyers from Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC. Reach out to schedule a free initial consultation and learn how we can help you claim the workers’ compensation benefits you deserve.

Common Workers’ Comp Injuries

There are a variety of injuries that would entitle you to workers’ comp. Most commonly, people envision a workplace injury as taking place on a construction site, packing warehouse, or other locale that involves a lot of physical labor. Often this is the case, but injuries can occur in any workspace, even the average office.

Our Charlotte workers’ comp lawyers represent many types of injuries, including but not limited to:

  • Overexertion and heavy lifting: These are the most common types of work-related injuries and occur as a result of trying to lift things that are too heavy or lifting them incorrectly. 
  • Repetitive motion injuries: Even the simplest physical task can cause an injury if it’s done too often and causes strain. Repetitive wrist motions, for example, can cause carpal tunnel injuries. There are many such injuries that can occur when you perform tasks with too much frequency.
  • Equipment-related injuries: When you work with heavy equipment, you can experience injury due to such factors as malfunctions, improper maintenance, negligence, poor design, chemical corrosion, and improper usage. Equipment corrodes over time if not maintained properly, which puts you at risk due to the negligence of your workplace.
  • Construction site injuries: Working on a construction site comes with inherent risk due to the presence of large machinery, along with the risks concerning defective equipment, falls, explosions, and structural collapses.
  • Mental health impairment: If you are injured due to an accident in the workplace, you need to care for your mental health as much as your physical injuries. If you experience an increase in depression or anxiety due to your work-related accident, you deserve compensation in order to get the mental healthcare you need.

If you have suffered from these or other injuries on your worksite, we would love to hear from you to go over your options for pursuing the proper compensation.

How Charlotte Workers’ Comp Lawyers Can Help

If you have been injured by an accident at work, collaborating with our workers’ comp lawyers is the best way to ensure you are being paid what you are owed in full. 

Although you are entitled to workers’ comp, insurance companies who are interested in protecting their bottom line can sometimes be uncooperative. Worse, they will sometimes agree to pay but not give you all that you are owed, which makes it harder to pursue the remainder of your damages. 

We will help protect you. We will gather all evidence regarding your workplace incident, negotiate with your employer and the insurance company, and build a case in your favor. 

Vazquez Law Firm Will Fight For What You’re Owed

If you have been injured on the job, you are entitled to compensation! We will help you claim the money you are owed–you do not deserve the stress of having to fight this battle by yourself on top of everything else. Reach out to schedule a free initial consultation and learn how we can help you claim your workers’ comp so you can focus on healing. 

Practice Areas

  • Charlotte, NC Workers’ Comp Lawyers
